content:
Hello everyone, I am a new member of the Lean community, and I am learning about the application of Lean combined with AI tools. I want to know how to use Lean to call these AI tools to reduce complex proofs.
Any suggestions? Thanks in advance!
See the answers in your other thread: #general > automatic prover
But if you are interested in building more tools, then feel free to look around this steam to see current research in this area.
